Whoever does anything with the intention of causing wrongful gain to one person or wrongful loss to another person, is said to do that thing dishonestly
fraudulent, corrupt,swindling,cheating,double-dealing
A person is said to do a thing fraudulently if he does that thing with intent to defraud but not otherwise
"fraud,sharp practice,cheating,swindling,trickery

A person is said to ?counterfeit? who causes one thing to resemble another thing, intending by means of that resemblance to practice deception, or knowing it to be likely that deception will thereby be practiced
counterfeit,fake,forgery,copy,reproduction,replica,imitation
Denotes the death of a human being unless the contrary appears from the context
suicide,hanging‎,pesticide,poisoning,self-destruction,self-immolation,self-slaughter

In every case in which sentence of death shall have been passed, the appropriate Government may, without the consent of the offender, commute the punishment for any other punishment provided by this Code
murder,suicide,death,killed,assassination,bloodshed,crime,destruction,felony,homicide,lynching,manslaughter,massacre,shooting,slaying,terrorism
Whoever commits murder shall be punished with death, or imprisonment for life, and shall also be liable to fine
murder,suicide,death,killed,assassination,bloodshed,crime,destruction,felony,homicide,lynching,manslaughter,massacre,shooting,slaying,terrorism
Whoever, being under sentence of imprisonment for life, commits murder, shall be punished with death
murder,suicide,death,killed,assassination,bloodshed,crime,destruction,felony,homicide,lynching,manslaughter,massacre,shooting,slaying,terrorism

Causing death by negligence. Whoever causes the death of any person by doing any rash or negligent act not amounting to culpable homicide shall be punished with imprisonment of either description for a term which may extend to two years, or with fine, or with both

Waging or attempting to wage war, or abetting the waging of war, against the Government of India. Imprisonment for life or imprisonment upto 10 years along with fine Non-bailable

Abetting mutiny or attempting to seduce a soldier, sailor or airman . Non-bailable. Imprisonment for life or 10 years with fine

Injuring places of worship with an intent to insult the religion of any class. Non-bailable. Imprisonment for 2 years with fine
